name: Runner Pong
description:
I made this in 2 hours for https://itch.io/jam/pingpongpeng

I'm surprised by the result, it's actually quite fun. Very simple gameplay, avoid the red blocks and stop the red ball from hitting the ceiling.

Use [UP] to move up, [DOWN] to move down, [LEFT] and [RIGHT] to move right and left, not respectively. Hope that was helpful! (Use arrow keys to move yourself.)
